title: Episode 294: Article I, Section 8, Pt.2
itunes:title: Episode 294: Article I, Section 8, Pt.2
description:
Article I, Section 8 of the Constitution lists the things the Federal government is permitted to do. Somewhere in our history, citizens have come to regard the Constitution as a document that outlines what the government is not allowed to do. That’s exactly the opposite of what the Founders intended.
